video.title: Sons of Anarchy
video.synopsis: After seizing control of its town, gun-running motorcycle club the Sons of Anarchy soon butts heads with rival biker gangs, racist groups and the law.

episodes.synopsis: As Jax grows weary of the increasing lawlessness of the motorcycle club he's involved with, his crank-addicted ex-wife gives birth to his son.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: A new deputy police chief arrives in Charming, and Jax suggests a nonviolent way to throw him off the club's trail.
episodes.title: Seeds

episodes.synopsis: The club members take arms to capture an assailant after the daughter of a prominent family is assaulted. Meanwhile, Tara's ex pays her a visit.
episodes.title: Fun Town

episodes.synopsis: The club members head to Nevada to help a brother club, the Devil's Tribe, after they receive threats from the Mayans.
episodes.title: Patch Over

episodes.synopsis: A former club member, who was to blame for Opie's arrest, creates tension at a town fundraiser. Meanwhile, the club is still under investigation.
episodes.title: Giving Back

episodes.synopsis: When Piney's war buddy stops by to ask a small favor, it's up to Jax to handle everything. Meanwhile, a familiar face from the past comes to visit.
episodes.title: AK-51

episodes.synopsis: When old bones are discovered on the outskirts of Charming, secrets that Clay buried are exhumed, too. Meanwhile, Kohn's investigation turns personal.
episodes.title: Old Bones

episodes.synopsis: With the gun payment to the Irish Republican Army looming, the club struggles to come up with the cash.
episodes.title: The Pull

episodes.synopsis: While dealing with a badly wounded Cameron Hayes, the club plans retaliation against a rival biker group.
episodes.title: Hell Followed

episodes.synopsis: With Agent Stahl pressing the club's women, Jax sees Unser as the key to the group's salvation. Meanwhile, Cherry reveals information about her past.
episodes.title: Better Half

episodes.synopsis: Jax must choose between friendship and his loyalty to the club when one member is arrested for murder and another disappears.
episodes.title: Capybara

episodes.synopsis: Clay's solution to pay for Bobby's defense leaves the club in a vulnerable position. Later, Abel's happy homecoming ends in turmoil.
episodes.title: The Sleep of Babies

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of a tragedy, the club must reevaluate its bonds of brotherhood.
episodes.title: The Revelator

episodes.synopsis: With the club divided in the wake of Donna's death, Clay sets up a new gun deal with the Irish Republican Army.
episodes.title: Albification

episodes.synopsis: Jax's decision-making without the club's approval doesn't sit well with Clay -- especially when it brings dangerous repercussions.
episodes.title: Small Tears

episodes.synopsis: The League takes bold new steps in its quest to undermine the club, which is forced to take explosive measures.
episodes.title: Fix

episodes.synopsis: The club runs into trouble as they head north on a "charity" run. Back home, Gemma is left in a compromising position with the League.
episodes.title: Eureka

episodes.synopsis: Charming and its small-town appeal become vulnerable to the League, which finds new ways to provoke members of the Sons of Anarchy.
episodes.title: Smite

episodes.synopsis: Incited by Zobelle, Clay sets a course for retaliation -- forcing Jax to turn to an unlikely source to save the club from destruction.
episodes.title: Falx Cerebri

episodes.synopsis: Because the League has some club members behind bars, they must make new alliances in prison to survive.
episodes.title: Gilead

episodes.synopsis: With a dwindling gun supply, the club takes extreme measures to procure weapons for a customer.
episodes.title: Potlatch

episodes.synopsis: With the club's adult-film business becoming a hindrance, Clay seizes the opportunity to revive the gun-running cartel.
episodes.title: Fa Guan

episodes.synopsis: With the repo business proving more fruitful than the club ever imagined, Agent Stahl takes notice of the handsome profits.
episodes.title: Balm

episodes.synopsis: Chibs makes a secret deal with Agent Stahl to protect his wife and daughter. Meanwhile, an emotional Opie seeks both revenge and reconciliation.
episodes.title: Service

episodes.synopsis: The entire family goes on lockdown as Jax and Clay prepare to battle the League. Meanwhile, Weston learns the truth about Zobelle's business dealings.
episodes.title: The Culling

episodes.synopsis: As the club attempts to rid Charming of Zobelle and the League permanently, familiar faces present new challenges.
episodes.title: Na Triobloidi

episodes.synopsis: The aftermath of Abel's kidnapping has the Sons reeling -- especially Jax, whose grief sends him deeper into turmoil about his future with the club.
episodes.title: SO

episodes.synopsis: To get information about Abel's whereabouts, Jax and the club help a bounty hunter. Meanwhile, Gemma deals with family issues.
episodes.title: Oiled

episodes.synopsis: In need of cash, the club exploits its porn connections to entertain Henry Lin's clients, which doesn't sit well with one member.
episodes.title: Caregiver

episodes.synopsis: While Jax and Clay head north in search of Abel, Gemma tries to put longstanding family matters to rest.
episodes.title: Home

episodes.synopsis: To help his mother, the club and his son, Jax forms an unlikely alliance. Meanwhile, the club sends Chucky undercover.
episodes.title: Turning and Turning

episodes.synopsis: To protect their territory, the Sons of Anarchy must handle an informant at St. Thomas.
episodes.title: The Push

episodes.synopsis: The Grim Bastards have a problem that could jeopardize the club's new business arrangements.
episodes.title: Widening Gyre

episodes.synopsis: When the mother club pays a visit to another chapter, friction develops between the two groups.
episodes.title: Lochan Mor

episodes.synopsis: The club embarks on a gun-running assignment for the Irish Republican Army. Back home, Margaret offers to do a favor for Tara.
episodes.title: Turas

episodes.synopsis: The Irish Republican Army wants proof that one of their own has flipped -- and the Sons of Anarchy intend to give it to them.
episodes.title: Firinne

episodes.synopsis: While the club is on a manhunt, Jax faces the toughest decision of his life.
episodes.title: Bainne

episodes.synopsis: With a member of the club held hostage, Jax must choose between revenge and the good of Charming.
episodes.title: June Wedding

episodes.synopsis: The Russians and the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms prove to be obstacles as the club looks to heal old wounds.
episodes.title: NS

episodes.synopsis: Fresh out of jail, Jax and the other club members reunite with family, confront Charming's new sheriff and shift business alliances.
episodes.title: Out

episodes.synopsis: The Sons of Anarchy are forced to make a decision that could challenge the club's future.
episodes.title: Booster

episodes.synopsis: The club encounters an unlikely foe when a piece of their business disappears.
episodes.title: Dorylus

episodes.synopsis: While the club makes a run to set up a new business venture, Gemma finds a new ally in Charming.
episodes.title: Una Venta

episodes.synopsis: As the sheriff presses Juice for more information, the club enlists a former foe to help stop the development of Charming Heights.
episodes.title: Brick

episodes.synopsis: The club's relationship with the cartel is put in jeopardy when an important package is compromised.
episodes.title: With an X

episodes.synopsis: As the club deals with the fallout from a death threat made against Tara, Juice contemplates suicide.
episodes.title: Fruit for the Crows

episodes.synopsis: An important vote gets sidetracked when the Sons of Anarchy are forced to deal with a dangerous external threat against the club.
episodes.title: Family Recipe

episodes.synopsis: The club gets word that the Niners gang has made a new alliance. Meanwhile, Gemma and Unser find Piney's body.
episodes.title: Kiss

episodes.synopsis: Jax and Tara get a glimpse of life without the club but discover that their reality is hard to escape.
episodes.title: Hands

episodes.synopsis: A powerful adversary threatens the club's business dealings with the cartel.
episodes.title: Call of Duty

episodes.synopsis: The club negotiates with the gun-running Irish Kings to secure its future.
episodes.title: Burnt and Purged Away

episodes.synopsis: Jax is confronted with a new challenge that threatens his family and the club.
episodes.title: To Be - Act 1

episodes.synopsis: Jax must overcome great obstacles as he attempts to finalize the gun deal between the Irish Kings and the cartel.
episodes.title: To Be - Act 2

episodes.synopsis: Jax takes charge of the club as a series of events stirs up trouble in Charming.
episodes.title: Sovereign

episodes.synopsis: Jax and the club are challenged as past sins resurface.
episodes.title: Authority Vested

episodes.synopsis: A desperate situation tests family and club bonds.
episodes.title: Laying Pipe

episodes.synopsis: Complications arise as the Sons band together to face a new adversary.
episodes.title: Stolen Huffy

episodes.synopsis: Jax attempts to pull the club into a new business venture.
episodes.title: Orca Shrugged

episodes.synopsis: Jax brings a dangerous new proposal to the club.
episodes.title: Small World

episodes.synopsis: Jax takes matters into his own hands when things go awry.
episodes.title: Toad's Wild Ride

episodes.synopsis: Alliances are put to the test, and bonds are broken.
episodes.title: Ablation

episodes.synopsis: Jax gets closer to the truth, but there are still obstacles in his way.
episodes.title: Andare Pescare

episodes.synopsis: Anticipating a backlash, Jax shifts into high gear with his agenda.
episodes.title: Crucifixed

episodes.synopsis: As Jax scrambles to put his affairs in order, Nero handles business with his former crew.
episodes.title: To Thine Own Self

episodes.synopsis: Jax arranges to take the club in a different direction.
episodes.title: Darthy

episodes.synopsis: Jax strikes a new deal while ridding himself of old problems.
episodes.title: J'ai Obtenu Cette

episodes.synopsis: A shooting at a Catholic school is linked to the club's gunrunning business, threatening Jax's attempt to make SAMCRO legitimate.
episodes.title: Straw

episodes.synopsis: Jax's attempt to exit the gun business meets with opposition from the Irish, and Nero's cousin pays the price for his role in the school shooting.
episodes.title: One One Six

episodes.synopsis: Toric finds a way to turn his accidental murder of a hooker to his advantage, and Clay maneuvers to protect himself behind bars.
episodes.title: Poenitentia

episodes.synopsis: Toric attempts to wrest information from Otto, and Galen's ire over Jax's push to stop running guns sparks a bitter feud.
episodes.title: Wolfsangel

episodes.synopsis: Tara makes a secret arrangement with Lowen, and when SAMCRO abducts some of the Irish, Jax tries to calm the IRA.
episodes.title: The Mad King

episodes.synopsis: At a summit meeting of West Coast chapters, Jax announces his break with the IRA, and Bobby adds new recruits to the Charming chapter of SOA.
episodes.title: Salvage

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to flee Charming with her kids, Tara makes a desperate move to elude Gemma's grasp. Meanwhile, DA Patterson tries to turn Nero on the club.
episodes.title: Sweet and Vaded

episodes.synopsis: The D.A. reveals the possible supplier of the guns used in the school shooting, with unexpected -- and tragic -- consequences.
episodes.title: Los Fantasmas

episodes.synopsis: Jax gives up the IRA in a deal with DA Patterson for immunity, and Clay takes the first steps in his prison escape plan.
episodes.title: John 8:32

episodes.synopsis: As Jax and the Irish negotiate with the last SAMCRO customers, the Cacuzza family, the Chinese try to extort the Sons' business.
episodes.title: Huang Wu

episodes.synopsis: Bobby is shot while breaking Clay out of prison during a transfer, and Tara considers the next move for herself and her sons.
episodes.title: Aon Rud Pearsanta

episodes.synopsis: The clubs' rivalries grow more violent as Jax nears his goal of getting SAMCRO out of the gun business once and for all.
episodes.title: You Are My Sunshine

episodes.synopsis: While Jax hunts for Tara and his kids, Alvarez and Lin battle the One-Niners, and Gemma lashes out.
episodes.title: A Mother's Work

episodes.synopsis: After Jax leaves prison, he makes revenge for Tara's death a club priority. Wendy leaves rehab and finds Juice hiding out at her apartment.
episodes.title: Black Widower

episodes.synopsis: Jax solicits help from the Nevada charter to bring Lin down, while Unser looks into Tara's murder and Gemma throws the blame on one of Lin's men.
episodes.title: Toil and Till

episodes.synopsis: Jax forms alliances with other gangs to bring down Lin and Marks, Juice tries to make amends with the club, and Nero gets pulled into the gang war.
episodes.title: Playing with Monsters

episodes.synopsis: Jax's alliances create trouble as he sets up a drug deal with Tully that goes horribly wrong, and Lin's men enact a brutal revenge.
episodes.title: Poor Little Lambs

episodes.synopsis: Betrayal inside the Sons leads to a violent skirmish at the port, Jax accuses Lin of killing Tara, and Juice discovers that Gemma has lied to him.
episodes.title: Some Strange Eruption

episodes.synopsis: As the Sons deal with the bodies and wreckage at Diosa, Jax plays the gangs off against each other, and Juice leaves Gemma behind.
episodes.title: Smoke 'em if You Got 'em

episodes.synopsis: In order to undermine a powerful club enemy, Samcro forms an unlikely partnership, and Abel overhears a disturbing admission.
episodes.title: Greensleeves

episodes.synopsis: While Samcro tries to flush out a traitor, Juice asks for protective custody, and Jury accuses Jax of making the club everything his father hated.
episodes.title: The Separation of Crows

episodes.synopsis: While Jax negotiates with Marks for Bobby's return, Juice plans to kill Lin, and Jarry learns that Gemma made a false accusation.
episodes.title: What a Piece of Work Is Man

episodes.synopsis: Samcro sets an ambush for Cartwright and his men, and Jax finds some solace with another woman but faces difficult questions from Abel.
episodes.title: Faith and Despondency

episodes.synopsis: Facing trouble with SOA, Jax speculates about Gemma and Juice, Unser tells him some hard truths, and Gemma learns that Juice confessed to Jax.
episodes.title: Suits of Woe

episodes.synopsis: As the gangs fight over Lin's territory, Juice confronts Tully, and Gemma forces Jax and Unser to take decisive action.
episodes.title: Red Rose

episodes.synopsis: Jax wraps up outstanding matters, ensuring the future of the club and of Wendy and the boys, before finally fulfilling his father's legacy.
episodes.title: Papa's Goods
